summary:
I'm an iOS Developer with 10+ years of experience. I have more than 160 iOS application on Apple app store. 
Currently, I'm seeking a challenging position where the smart move positively affects a lot of people and societies. in a nutshell: Looking forward to work on hard things that matters with people smarter than me.

About me: I am aspirant person, achiever. Always motivated by being the best that i can be. I always seek challenges and achievements in my life. 
Self learning is my most remarkable sign. I like to work in a team and also I am a key team player. I love helping other people and exchanging knowledge and experience. I have a unique mix of technical and non-technical skills. 
I am fast learner and adaptable to new methodologies, and also i think this mix of experiences will help me in achieving my goals.

projects.title: Talal Fakher
projects.description:
Talal Fakher official application. 
This app aims to increase the awareness about Talal Fakher and also it has all his RBTs based on the detected operator. The app includes multiple modules as well like Prayer Times, Alert service by SMS, Nearest Mosq, Qibla compass, Talal audios, videos, latest news, images, Whatsapp, etc.

projects.title: Hamed Zaid
projects.description:
The legendary poet Hamed Zaid official application! 
This app aims to increase the awareness about Hamed and also it has all his RBTs based on the detected operator. The app includes multiple modules as well like All hamed written poems, Alert service by SMS, Sharing module, Hamed audios, latest news, images, videos, etc.

projects.title: Nafaes
projects.description:
The official application of Kuwait Nafaes campaign. 
This app aims to increase the awareness about Nafaes project and Islam principles. It has all needed islamic features like qibla, nearest mosque, prayer times, audios and videos recorded by all popular Sheikhs … etc and it has all the information about the campaign and the members.

projects.title: Inshop Virtual Menu
projects.description: Application developed to browse restaurants and menus with augmented reality features for scan logo or scan item from menu. This app provides also rating and reviews for each item. Also it enables the users to preview their taken images by compass or even hanging them on the restaurant walls using augmentation way. And also chatting with each other to ask about their opinions about dishes or even the provided service in any restaurant .

profile_positions.description:
- Worked in Guest app Infra team, responsible for adopting new technologies, provide support and ownership for all 3rd party components, adopting new architecture and providing evolution proposals and learning materials for them.
- Currently working on the partner app `Pulse`, owning the availability module. Mainly, responsible for revamping the whole module using totally new design and while doing that we run a lot of experiments to monitor the partners satisfaction and check if there's a room for improvement.
profile_positions.title: iOS Developer

profile_positions.description:
- Design and build advanced applications for the iOS and Android platforms using Xamarin.
- Work on bug fixing and improving application performance.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
profile_positions.title: Senior Mobile Developer

profile_positions.description:
- Lead the iOS team and provide oversight and support in all aspects of development, design and maintenance.
- Supporting the team members and make sure they finish there tasks as required.
profile_positions.title: Lead iOS Developer

profile_positions.description: Working as senior iOS Developer in the elite "Core Components" team, which was responsible for developing custom reusable components for Vodafone Group and launching them on the company private repositories to be centralized components used by all the company developers in their applications, we also worked in an Agile environment with a team of 7 iOS Developers.
profile_positions.title: Senior IOS Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
Was responsible for:
-  Creating content mobile apps for celebrities and providing a way for the users to use the content "Downloading, setting something as a call tone"  
- Creating POCs and demo apps for the company clients.
- Hiring / interviewing candidates for mobile developers related jobs.
- Supporting interns dealing with the company, the apps,  and make sure they finish there tasks as required
profile_positions.title: Senior IOS Developer, Part-time

profile_positions.description:
-Was responsible for designing and implementing a major iOS applications like:
"Orange AirBox" which was developed using Swift" 
"Orange Football Club" which was developed using Obj-C
- Fixing bugs and implementing new change requests in "Orange Personal Hotspot" which was android app
- Supporting other teammates in "Oscar" which was iOS Xamarin app 
- Worked on web front end applications like "E-Brochure".
profile_positions.title: Full Stack Developer

profile_positions.description:
Worked as senior iOS Developer, i was responsible for designing and building advanced applications for the iOS platform (iPhone and iPad), collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features, unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability., work on bug fixing and improving applications performance, participate in mentoring and skills transfer to junior members of the team, developing Concurrently, in case of limited time frames.
We were also trying to discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.
profile_positions.title: Senior iOS Developer

profile_positions.description:
Worked as iOS Developer "a sole developer for quite some time", i was responsible for developing mobile applications and creating demos for the clients as a prove of concept, also i was working on augmented reality applications, we created more than four  apps  using vuforia SDK "augmented reality SDK for detecting and tracking a specific objects" most of them were for private distribution "event based applications" or as a prove of concept.
I was responsible also for creating a template generator "Whitelabel app", to facilitate on the customer the app generation process.
